item.description:
No we aren't tasting fruit wines, but a totally different style of white wine.  "Orange" wines are white wines that are fermented just like red wines--on the skins.  This results in a coppery colored liquid that has the bite of tannins and complexity like you wouldn't believe.  It's an ancient method of winemaking that is enjoying a recent resurgence as indie-style producers test the boundaries of our palates.

 

Come join us for an evening of some unique wines that are really food friendly.  Think strong fatty cheeses, charcuterie, full-bodied appetizers, or even spicy finger foods when considering your appetizer donation!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: January Tasting: "Orange" Wines
